GSD.product_version: versions from v4.6 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
ASoC: mediatek: mt8173-rt5650: Fix refcount leak in mt8173_rt5650_dev_probe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit 5ec83aa7a9e5bcca80ccd49978916feb4e0ffc07, it was introduced in version v4.6 by commit 0f83f9296d5c91d08cf46cf1ba8a17fb870dedf0. For more details please see the references link.
